## ExternalComponent type

Represents a External Component: an item provided from external system.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ExternalComponent = Component & {
    DirectLinkToPublished?: string;
    DisplayType?: string;
    ExternalMetadata?: FieldsValueDictionary;
    ExternalMetadataSchemaFields?: FieldsDefinitionDictionary;
    StubId?: string;
};
```
